headline: AppLovin: Too High To Buy, Too Hot To Sell
summary: AppLovin is projected to grow at strong double-digit growth over the next 5 years. Read why APP stock is rated as Hold despite strong growth prospects.

headline: Should You Forget Palantir and Buy These 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Instead?
summary: Having nearly quadrupled this year while also joining the S&P 500 index, Palantir (NASDAQ: PLTR) has no doubt gained a lot of investor attention.  The biggest knock on Palantir is not its business, which has been seeing accelerating growth as commercial and government customers begin adopting its AI platform, but a valuation that has ballooned to a forward price-to-sales (P/S) multiple of 45.7 times analyst estimates for 2025 revenue, and a staggering 147 times forward price-to-earnings (P/E) ratio, as of this writing.  Against that backdrop, let's look at two cheaper AI stocks growing revenue at a similar rate as Palantir that investors could consider as alternatives.
